reasons: prediction_0 and prediction_1 are identical and more accurate compared to prediction_2;
output:
1 Happy are those whose way is blameless, who walk in the law of the Lord.
2 Happy are those who keep his precepts, who seek him with their whole heart, who also do no wrong.
3 But walk within his ways.
4 You have commanded all your statutes, and they be kept diligently.
5 O that my ways may be made steadfast in keeping all your decrees.
6 Then I shall not be ashamed, having my eyes fixed on all your commandments.
7 I will sing with an upright heart, and I will learn your righteous ways.
8 I will observe your statutes, O Father, and do not utterly forsake me.
